title: Introducing: Tom Day
content:
Melbournite Tom Day burst onto the ambient scene last year with comedown classics Who You Want To Be and Love Your Life.

Together with Monsoonsiren he created precious symphonies with captivating vocals reminiscent of Sigur Ros, albeit without the often intrusive crescendos.

His latest efforts, released via SoundCloud, weave birdsong with delicately crafted melodies to produce idyllic 6am soundtracks. The stand out track Future Holds features tempered breakbeat percussion and consequently renewed vitality.
